name: Narrative Reframing
description: Rewriting personal history by shifting the meaning of past trauma to serve a higher purpose.

cards.title: Identifying the Existing Trauma Narrative
cards.description: Bringing awareness to the unconscious stories being repeated about past pain.
cards.bulletpoints: Mapping Trauma Perception, Recognizing Limiting Storylines, Identifying Negative Loops

cards.title: Transforming the Victim Mindset
cards.description: Recasting yourself as the hero rather than the victim in your lifeâ€™s story.
cards.bulletpoints: Power Identity Shift, Heroic Perspective Installation, Ownership of Past Events

cards.title: Mythologizing Your Life Journey
cards.description: Rewriting personal experiences into a greater, empowering life narrative.
cards.bulletpoints: Archetype Integration, Symbolic Life Mapping, Self-Authoring Techniques
